articles.title: A.I. Is Mastering Language. Should We Trust What It Says? - The New York Times
articles.description: OpenAI’s GPT-3 and other neural nets can now write original prose with mind-boggling fluency — a development that could have profound implications for the future.
articles.content: But as GPT-3s fluency has dazzled many observers, the large-language-model approach has also attracted significant criticism over the last few years. Some skeptics argue that the software is capable … [+6465 chars]
